info.name: devSUBMIT
info.description:
This style will change deviantART's new Submissions Page to match with the rest of the sites colours.
Please note this only affects the Submit Art page, not Sta.sh.
info.additionalInfo:
Let me know if you spot any bugs! :)

Updated to 1.2: Functionality restored after a changed made by dA. A full fix will be released as soon as possible.
